title: Looking for team (Ranked)
body:
Level: 29 
Pref role: Adc/Mid/Top (in that order)
Age: 20

I am almost level 30, and want a team that dedicated to become challenger. I must admit I'm a average skilled player, but with the willingness to improve, a love for the game and the work ethic of a beast, it wont take me long to become a competitive LoL player.

i want to join a smart, reliable, headstraight team who aims for the same goal i am, to become unbeatable ;D

Add me in game and msg me.
-TheChadMizer

replies.body: be aware, that if you look at the www.op.gg of most challenger players, it took them a year or three to get there, good luck :)
Yeah i know .. But we all have to start from somewhere yeah ;) ?
4 Years later, the highest he got was Bronze season 6 and 7 and he gave up before the Season 8 level changes, so is still level 30, oof

Your average MMR for normals games is around mid-low bronze level, The chance of you being able to improve to get to challenger level in the next year or 2 are very low, i do however wish you luck on your journey.

My normal play are mostly with friends and enjoyment, once i am ranked i will play every game to the best of my ability and while im still in blind pick i learn roles and champs. I understand your comment but if it takes me 5 years to become master/challenger i doesn't throw me off, i still have the desire to reach my goal.. As every other challenger play had when they were bronze.
